text: Island of Death (, Ta pediá tou Diavólou, ), also known as Devils in Mykonos and A Craving For Lust, is a 1976 Greek horror movie. It was directed by Nico Mastorakis and starring Jessica Dublin, Jane Lyle, Robert Behling, Gerard Gonalons, Nikos Tsachiridis. ==Other websites== * * Category:1976 horror movies Category:1976 LGBT movies Category:Greek movies Category:Movies set on islands Category:Movies directed by Nico Mastorakis
title: Island of Death
